Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) offer the potential for compelling value propositions in stationary and transportation applications through their high efficiency and fuel flexibility-two critical characteristics that will allow them to facilitate our transition to a carbon neutral economy.
Titulo: Perspective-The Role of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in Our Carbon-Neutral Future

Sentencas: This paper describes the overall integration synergies that can be realized in hybrid systems comprised of an SOFC and an engine bottom-cycle.
Titulo: Perspective-The Role of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in Our Carbon-Neutral Future

Sentencas: The development to date is reviewed, and application-specific value propositions are explored.
Titulo: Perspective-The Role of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in Our Carbon-Neutral Future

Sentencas: Finally, the environmental impact of hybrid systems are discussed, and key challenges to overcome are examined for this highly efficient conversion technology to achieve commercial success.
Titulo: Perspective-The Role of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in Our Carbon-Neutral Future
